title: DisCO of Urgency
description: Cardano Community is limited to male-dominated tech sphere / Potential adopters outside tech sphere don't know how to engage with Cardano
solution: Introduce Cardano into an established, worldwide arts & culture ecosystem including queer & female communities with large social impact.
experience: Board members, creators and artists from SpaceofUrgency, "Frei(t)räume" & "Stadt Nach Acht" conferences in Berlin, UnitedWeStream.
